description: This file contains stub classes mimicking Flutter's core API surface for static analysis purposes when the Flutter SDK is unavailable. It provides minimal class definitions, constructors, and constants to satisfy the static analyzer and enable code completion, but it does not include runtime implementations.

classes.name: Widget
classes.description: Base class for Flutter widgets, representing immutable UI components.

classes.name: Key
classes.description: Identifier for widget instances in the widget tree.

classes.name: StatelessWidget
classes.description: Base class for widgets that do not require mutable state.

classes.name: WidgetsFlutterBinding
classes.description: Stub class to initialize Flutter app binding without runtime dependencies.

classes.name: MaterialApp
classes.description: Stub widget representing the root of a Material Design app.

classes.name: RouteSettings
classes.description: Represents configuration options for navigation routes.

classes.name: MaterialPageRoute
classes.description: Stub class for creating page routes with route configuration.

classes.name: ChangeNotifier
classes.description: Stub class for the observer pattern, used with providers.

classes.name: Scaffold
classes.description: Stub widget representing a basic visual layout structure.

classes.name: PreferredSizeWidget
classes.description: Interface for widgets with a preferred size, like AppBar.

classes.name: PreferredSize
classes.description: Stub class to specify a widget's preferred size.

classes.name: Size
classes.description: Represents width and height dimensions.

classes.name: Container
classes.description: Stub widget for painting, positioning, and sizing child widgets.

classes.name: BoxDecoration
classes.description: Stub class for decorating containers, such as backgrounds.

classes.name: LinearGradient
classes.description: Defines gradient fills for decorations.

classes.name: Alignment
classes.description: Specifies alignment points within a rectangle.

classes.name: AppBar
classes.description: Stub widget representing the application top app bar.

classes.name: Theme
classes.description: Provides theme configuration and allows retrieving theme data.

classes.name: ColorScheme
classes.description: Defines color palette parameters for the app theme.

classes.name: AppBarTheme
classes.description: Style configuration for AppBar widgets.

classes.name: TextStyle
classes.description: Represents style information for text.

classes.name: TextTheme
classes.description: Collection of text styles for different text elements.

classes.name: IconThemeData
classes.description: Style configuration for icons.

classes.name: FontWeight
classes.description: Enumeration for font weight weights.

classes.name: CardTheme
classes.description: Styling configuration for Card widgets.

classes.name: InputDecorationTheme
classes.description: Styling configuration for input fields.

classes.name: ElevatedButtonThemeData
classes.description: Styling configuration for elevated buttons.

classes.name: ElevatedButton
classes.description: Static method to create style configurations for ElevatedButton widgets.

classes.name: EdgeInsets
classes.description: Defines interior spacing for widgets.

classes.name: BorderRadius
classes.description: Defines corner radii for borders.

classes.name: Radius
classes.description: Represents corner radius values.

classes.name: InputBorder
classes.description: Styling for input widget borders.

classes.name: OutlineInputBorder
classes.description: Border with outline style for input fields.

classes.name: BorderSide
classes.description: Represents the border line's color and width.

classes.name: Color
classes.description: Represents an ARGB color value.

classes.name: Colors
classes.description: Collection of standard color constants.
